node_info.name: koBoToolbox
node_info.description: Work with KoBoToolbox forms and submissions
node_info.subtitle: ={{$parameter["operation"] + ": " + $parameter["resource"]}}

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Get a form

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a form

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many forms

options.name: Redeploy
options.description: Redeploy Current Form Version

properties.name: formId
properties.description: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to sort by descending order

options.name: sort
options.description: Whether to sort by descending order

values.name: descending
values.description: Whether to sort by descending order

properties.name: filters
properties.description: A text search query based on form data - e.g. "owner__username:meg AND name__icontains:quixotic" - see docs for more details

options.name: filter
options.description: A text search query based on form data - e.g. "owner__username:meg AND name__icontains:quixotic" - see docs for more details

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Get a single hook definition

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a single hook definition

options.name: Get Many
options.description: List many hooks on a form

options.name: Logs
options.description: Get hook logs

options.name: Retry All
options.description: Retry all failed attempts for a given hook

options.name: Retry One
options.description: Retry a specific hook

properties.name: formId
properties.description: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: hookId
properties.description: Hook ID (starts with h, e.g. hVehywQ2oXPYGHJHKtqth4)

properties.name: logId
properties.description: Hook log ID (starts with hl, e.g. hlSbGKaUKzTVNoWEVMYbLHe)

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: status
properties.description: Only retrieve logs with a specific status

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: Minimum date for the hook log to retrieve

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: Maximum date for the hook log to retrieve

properties.description: Delete a single submission

options.description: Delete a single submission

options.description: Get a single submission

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many submissions

options.name: Get Validation Status
options.description: Get the validation status for the submission
options.action: Get the validation status for a submission

options.name: Update Validation Status
options.description: Set the validation status of the submission
options.action: Update the validation status for a submission

properties.name: formId
properties.description: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: submissionId
properties.description: Submission ID (number, e.g. 245128)

properties.name: validationStatus
properties.description: Desired Validation Status

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.displayName: See Formhub API docs to creating filters, using the MongoDB JSON format - e.g. {"_submission_time":{"$lt":"2021-10-01T01:02:03"}}
properties.name: jsonNotice
options
properties.description: Whether to download submitted attachments

options.name: download
options.description: Whether to download submitted attachments

options.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
options.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"

options.name: fields
options.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve (e.g. _submission_time,_submitted_by). If left blank, all fields are retrieved.

options.name: version
options.description: Attachment size to retrieve, if multiple versions are available

options.name: selectMask
options.description: Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as multiselect fields, i.e. parsed as arrays.

options.name: numberMask
options.description: Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as numbers

options.name: reformat
options.description: Whether to apply some reformatting to the submission data, such as parsing GeoJSON coordinates

options.name: sort
options.description: Sort predicates, in MongoDB JSON format (e.g. {"_submission_time":1})

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a file

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a file

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete file

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a file content

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many files

properties.name: formId
properties.description: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: Uid of the file (should start with "af" e.g. "afQoJxA4kmKEXVpkH6SYbhb"

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the binary property to write the file into

properties.name: download
properties.description: Whether to download the file content into a binary property

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the binary property containing the file to upload. Supported types: image, audio, video, csv, xml, zip.

properties.name: fileUrl
properties.description: HTTP(s) link to the file to upload

submission.action: Update the validation status for a submission

subProperties.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
subProperties.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"

subProperties.name: fields
subProperties.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve (e.g. _submission_time,_submitted_by). If left blank, all fields are retrieved.

subProperties.name: version
subProperties.description: Attachment size to retrieve, if multiple versions are available

subProperties.name: selectMask
subProperties.description: Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as multiselect fields, i.e. parsed as arrays.

subProperties.name: numberMask
subProperties.description: Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as numbers

subProperties.name: reformat
subProperties.description: Whether to apply some reformatting to the submission data, such as parsing GeoJSON coordinates

subProperties.name: sort
subProperties.description: Sort predicates, in MongoDB JSON format (e.g. {"_submission_time":1})

subProperties.name: filter
subProperties.description: A text search query based on form data - e.g. "owner__username:meg AND name__icontains:quixotic" - see docs for more details

jsonNotice.displayName: See Formhub API docs to creating filters, using the MongoDB JSON format - e.g. {"_submission_time":{"$lt":"2021-10-01T01:02:03"}}
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice

notices.name: jsonNotice
notices.text: See Formhub API docs to creating filters, using the MongoDB JSON format - e.g. {"_submission_time":{"$lt":"2021-10-01T01:02:03"}}

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
